author: jluetic
body:
Adding consumes calls for following pixel packages:

SimTracker/SiPixelDigitizer
RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits 
EventFilter/SiPixelRawToDigi
CalibTracker/SiPixelTools 
CalibTracker/SiPixelGainCalibration 
CalibTracker/SiPixelErrorEstimation
title: Adding consumes calls to few Pixel packages
